subject: We’ve got a lot to chat about!

full_threads.body:

Our CEO is One in a Million

Pieter de Villiers, CEO and Co-Founder of Clickatell, has been recognized as a thought leader in mobile and social by the One Million by One Million Blog.

Six Steps to Getting Chat UX Right for Consumers

Clickatell Product Director, Joe de Wet, shares tips for companies wanting to build a chat channel that delights customers from the start.

Read more

In-Chat Payments Help CMOs Address Costly Breaks in Customer Journeys

A simple payment link within a WhatsApp message can hold the key for companies struggling with customer conversion and acquisition.

Read more

How SMS Technology Bolsters Customer Service at QSRs

SMS alerts and other SMS back-end technologies help restaurants succeed by supporting digital transactions, supporting API payments, and more.

Read more

Chat to Dis-Chem on WhatsApp

Retailer Dis-Chem Pharmacies has partnered with Clickatell to enable WhatsApp as its customer communication channel to engage with customers.

Read more

African Insurtech aYo Launches WhatsApp Customer Channel via Clickatell

aYo has partnered with Clickatell to launch its own WhatsApp channel, making the process of getting cover easier for its customers.

Q2 Product Wrap-Up

2022 has been an exciting year so far, with the second quarter following suit! What are some of the exciting updates from our product roadmap?

Clickatell Scoops Prestigious Nigerian ICT Award

Clickatell was recently acknowledged by Nigeria Communications Week as their
